specification.field.tag.duplicate: Can only have one validation rule per MARC field/tag number.
field.indicator.order.duplicate: Can only have one validation rule per MARC field indicator/order.
indicator.code.code.duplicate: Can only have one validation rule per MARC field indicator/code.
Pattern.specificationFieldChangeDto.tag: A MARC tag must contain three characters.
Min: {field} must be greater than or equal to {boundary}.
Max: {field} must be less than or equal to {boundary}.
